item.title: About me
item.author: kostas.makedos@gmail.com (Kostas Makedos)
item.description: My name is Kostas Makedos. I was born and raised in a small suburb of Athens. All of my friends and family were working class people. Studied Physics with a love for Astronomy. Never managed to do that professionally so it remained my dearest hobby. I love Computer Systems and I work as a Software Engineer for the past 20+ years. Ah, and I have a MSc in Informational Systems too.
